description: Basic HTML + JSON structure to create a new WCO node. Includes placeholders for civic entry, metadata, and optional EI signatures.
Preformatted structure for logging observations, proposals, or reflections. Includes fields for date, location, category, and optional resolution.
Minimal JSON ledger entry format to record visibility, mirrors, EI signatures, and cross-node references.
Suggested format for tagging entries: [WCO + location + date + topic]. Ensures discoverability and cross-node linking.
Optional web form template to collect citizen input, create JSON submissions automatically, and optionally mirror to public nodes.
